ygData.subject: Re: Wizards being resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d say an Enchanter( level 20) Stole a LJ kill from my group ( all level 16-20 s) in oasis last night .. You figure it out .. (Btw it was 3 tanks 1 mage 1
ygData.messageBody:
VorteksJRC@... wrote:

> From: VorteksJRC@...
>
> Enchanters aren't supposed to be good at DD. Enchanters are for INDIRECT
> damage. You shouldn't expect to see incredible powers. As for necros being
> stronger...that may be true. But remember, they pay there price for it.

I'd say an Enchanter( level 20) Stole a LJ kill from my group ( all level 16-20's) in oasis last night .. You figure it out .. (Btw it was 3 tanks 1 mage 1 necro)


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr
